inkball

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.GameObject
      • inkball.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hole, Spawner, Wall

    public class Tile
extends GameObject
    Represents a tile in the InkBall game grid. Tiles are the building blocks of the game board and can represent various elements like walls, holes, etc.
